projects_subtitle: Explore some of my most recent work
project_kyomu_desc: First real client project. Website for an artisanal Asian food business, optimizing WhatsApp orders and highlighting the brand experience.
project_kyomu_tags: Real Client Design ‚Ä¢ WhatsApp Orders ‚Ä¢ Commercial UX/UI
project_monster_desc: High-impact landing page capturing Monster Ultra's aesthetic essence. Premium branding focused on freshness and 'Zero Sugar' lifestyle.
project_monster_tags: Visual Branding ‚Ä¢ Minimalist Design ‚Ä¢ Direct Conversion
project_delivery_desc: Logistics management tool to track deliveries made during the day, week, or month, with PDF export capabilities and data filtering.
project_delivery_tags: Functional UX/UI ‚Ä¢ Real-time Tracking ‚Ä¢ High Visibility
project_luna_desc: Online booking system for a fictional beauty salon. Multi-step flow with interactive calendar, real-time validations, and modern animations with parallax effects.
project_luna_tags: Booking System ‚Ä¢ Scroll Animations ‚Ä¢ Responsive Design
